unnormalised: Arre bhai, bazaar aaz poddla! Tata Motors 2% khala denvla, Reliance lagbhag ₹2750 ak'kanch asa. Hanv thamboun dharun vchum vo vikun uddoyum? HDFC Bank-an g పెట్టుబడి korunk sodtam, aikola tankam borem dividend melta, zoxem 7.5% vorsak. Ani, hea novea IPO-chem kitem chal'la? Aikola 10 गुना odhik सब्सक्राइब zala mhonn. Konnui anubhavik गुंतवणूकदार hanga asa zalear sodhdhes divonk favo?
normalised: Arre bhai, bazaar mhaje aaj poddlem! Tata Motors don percent-an khal, Reliance lagbhag rupee don hazar saat she panchen jikla. Hanv dhurun dharunk zai vo vikunk? H-D-F-C Bank-an invest korpak chintam, aikollam te bore returanv ditat, sumar saat point panch percent p.a. Ani, he novea I-P-O-chi gosht kashi asa? Aikollam tem aplea apeksha dha pavti odhik bharunk ailem. Konnankui anubhavik investaranche updesh assat kai?
text: Arre bhai, bazaar aaz poddla! Tata Motors 2% khala denvla, Reliance lagbhag ₹2750 ak'kanch asa. Hanv thamboun dharun vchum vo vikun uddoyum? HDFC Bank-an g పెట్టుబడి korunk sodtam, aikola tankam borem dividend melta, zoxem 7.5% vorsak. Ani, hea novea IPO-chem kitem chal'la? Aikola 10 गुना odhik सब्सक्राइब zala mhonn. Konnui anubhavik गुंतवणूकदार hanga asa zalear sodhdhes divonk favo?
